Text:

I requested a movie called the I spit on your grave (remake 2010)  I know this movie hasnt been released yet so you might not be able to do it. So thanks anyway

But since you cant get that maybe you could try and do the original (if you can) I cant seem to find a handheld version of it here.
Thx, love your work
